page.title: 05HOUSING GOLDSBOROUGH AREA
page.content: Houses in the Goldsborough area are a mixture of {old }and{new.Older } {houses}in Goldsborough are made from {stone }quarried in the village. The quarry was filled in and Goldsborough House was built over the site. On the{York Road}there is a new estate called {Eastfields.}Work started on the estate in the {1970's} and is still continuing. The oldest houses are in Goldsborough and Coneythorpe,they were built in the{1700's}.The new houses were mainly built of brick.{ } A very small cottage with no{electricity}and an {outside toilet}sold for {Â£21000}in 1985. The houses are mainly detached and Bungalows.
